definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: riddle, enigmatic, perplexing saying or question;—abs. ´[[ח]] Ju Jdg 14:12 + 6 t.; sf. [[חִידָתִי]] Ju Jdg 14:18, Ps 49:5; [[חִידָֽתְךָ]] Ju Jdg 14:13; pl. abs. [[חִידוֹת]] 1Ki 10:1 + 4 t.; [[חִידׂת]] Nu 12:8; sf. [[חִידׂתָם]] Pr 1:6; —

riddle = dark, obscure utterance Nu 12:8 (JE; opp. [[פֶּה־אֶל־פֶּה]] and [[מַרְאֶה]]); of something put indirectly and needing interpretation;—an allegory ´[[חוד ח]] Ez Eze 17:2 (‖[[מְשׁׂל]] [[מָשָׁל]]); allegor. and fig. sayings Pr 1:6 (‖[[מְלִיחָה מָשָׁל]] and [[דִּבְרֵי חֲכָמִים]]); enigmat. sentences and comparisons, declaring fate of Chaldeans Hb Hab 2:6 (+ [[מְלִיחָה]]; ‖[[מָשָׁל]]), perplexing moral problem Ps 49:5 (c. [[פָּתַח]] open, propound; ‖[[מָשָׁל]]), a lesson taught indirectly Ps 78:2 ([[מִנִּי קֶדֶם]] ´[[ח]], c. [[הִבִּיעַ]]; ‖[[מָשָׁל]]).
riddle, enigma, to be guessed, in Ju Jdg 14:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: with vb. [[חוּד]] Ju Jdg 14:12, Jdg 14:13, Jdg 14:16 propound a riddle.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with vb. [[הִגִּיד]] tell (give answer to) a riddle Ju Jdg 14:14, Jdg 14:15, Jdg 14:17, Jdg 14:19.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: with vb. [[מחא]] find out a riddle Ju Jdg 14:18.
perplexing questions by which queen of Sheba put Sol. to the test ([[נִסָּה]]) 1Ki 10:1 = 2Ch 9:1.
